name: Purple Nights
description:
!!! Clicking the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner is highly recommended !!!

A fanfiction-game made for Waluijam! Made in Twine 2 during the last week or so of the jam because of IRL stuff. There are content warnings listed in-game, but basically, this game deals with themes of identity and autonomy, and has some sexual content but no explicit descriptions of sex acts. Hope yall enjoy!!
